Class ViewFactory

java.lang.Object
view.ViewFactory
public class ViewFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating dashboard strategies based on user type. Follows Factory Pattern and SOLID principles: - Single Responsibility: Only creates strategies - Open/Closed: New user types can be added by creating new strategy classes - Dependency Inversion: Returns DashboardStrategy interface, not concrete classes This refactored design eliminates if-else chains and makes the system extensible.
Since:
2025-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Method Details

    • createDashboardStrategy

      public static DashboardStrategy createDashboardStrategy(User user)
      Creates the appropriate dashboard strategy based on user type. Uses polymorphism to eliminate if-else chains.
      Parameters:
      user - The authenticated user (obtained from LoginController)
      Returns:
      DashboardStrategy for the user type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user type is not supported

    • createAndRunView

      public static void createAndRunView(User user)
      Creates and runs the appropriate dashboard based on user type. This is a convenience method that combines strategy creation and execution.
      Parameters:
      user - The authenticated user (obtained from LoginController)
